text: From the shadows, you strike. Your foes can only whisper hushed, feared rumors of your army's movements. You are never where they expect you to be. Let them try and hunt you down - you will not give them the fight they want. Instead, they must battle on your terms. One step at a time, you will dismantle their very institution, from within.

Numbers mean little if the villains cannot even find you. Rather than face their masses, strike them were it really hurts, instead. Spoil their supplies, poison their wells, and burn their infrastructure. Raid them swiftly, then vanish into the night once more.

With traditional warfare barely putting a dent into the military capabilities of your adversary's government, a fresh approach is needed. Consider striking at the morale of their men, and sapping their will to fight. If you cannot best them conventionally, there are other ways to win wars.
Ambushes, traps and feints are your key weapons in this war. Lure hostile armies away from their defensive positions to where you can use the terrain to your advantage!
Whether lurking in the shadows or on the open field, your brothers in arms are ready to fight. As their leader, is is down to you whether your rebellion will be one of subterfuge, or sheer might.

For too long, the people have suffered under tyranny and oppression. Give them something to bolster their spirits, and they will surely join your cause in droves. Even a beggar or a starving peasant can become a fierce warrior with the right leadership.

The people muster under your banners, and your numbers multiply day by day. Can they truly decry you as a "rebel" when you have won the hearts of so many? No longer do you command a disparate motley crew - by now, you are a general in your own right.

Your forces gather in proper formation, with organised ranks and a real command structure. They are tested on the battlefield and eager for more. The fatuous tyrants and their ilk cower behind their walls. Show them that the Heavens themselves yearn for change.

The full mobilisation of your righteous cause is at hand! Your glorious army, united in purpose, marches on in triumph! Neither on open battlefield nor behind their walls can your enemies oppose you. Victory is at hand!
Focus on plundering the local region, increasing the amount of loot gained per turn.
[[b]] Rebellion [[/b]]can be increased by using aggresive and raiding stance. It can also be increased by winning aggresive battles.
[[b]] Rebellion [[/b]]can be decreased by using defensive and ambush stance. It can also be increased by winning defensive battles.
• Double-sided resource, Defensive or Attacking bonuses.
• Unique stances that allow for different set of bonuses.
• Powerful bonuses for either attacking or defending.

Your faction are separatists, secessionists or revolutionaries, outcasts of the established status quo. Whether you fight for a religious cause, to restore a lost noble house, or to better the people, you will need cleverness or might to successfully resist the "legal" government.

Your faction are separatists, secessionists or revolutionaries, outcasts of the established status quo. Whether you fight for a religious cause, to restore a lost noble house, or to better the people, you will need cleverness or might to successfully resist the "legal" government.
